title: naaradha gurusvaami
sahitya:
nArada gurusvAmi ikanaina nannAdarimpavEmi I karavEmi



anupallavi



 sAreku sangIta naigama pAranagatuDaina parama pAvana



caraNam



 itihAssa purANAgama caritamu lavarivella galige patini dAnamiyya buddhi  

satyabhAma ketula galge dyutijita sharadabhra ninu vinA muni yatula kevaru 

galige kSitini tyAgarAja vinuta nammiti citta dIrci prahlAduni brOcina
